item.title: Do you plan to pursue MS at UMBC, but worried if Baltimore is safe or not? ğŸ“ğŸ”
item.description: Worried about safety in Baltimore as a student? Here's my personal take on living, studying, and thriving in the city.

ğŸ›¡ï¸ About Me

ğŸ•µï¸â€â™‚ï¸ How It All Started…

It all began when I was in 10th grade, innocently scrolling through Facebook, when a friend confidently told me:

“I can hack into your account without your password!”

Being the ever curious person I am, I challenged him. And to my absolute horror (and amazement), he actually did it! That moment sparked my obsession with cybersecurity.

I started like any newbie googling “how to hack Facebook” (don’t judge, we’ve all been there ğŸ˜†). That led me down a rabbit hole of phishing, OSINT, social engineering, bug bounties, and penetration testing. Fast forward to today, and here I am, living the cybersecurity dream, but this time, on the right side of the game. ğŸ˜
